OD: For /v2/cardVerification, if miss parameter carddata, return NE1177
For /v2/cardVerification, if the card holder name contains the special character ”|”, return NE1206
For /v2/cardVerification, if the card card type contains the special character ”|”, return NE1206
For /v2/cardVerification, if the card card brand contains the special character ”|”, return NE1206
For /v2/cardVerification, if the card uses DES encryption, then return NE1206
For /v2/cardVerification, if use cybs card to make payment and the payment mode is AUTH, when cardnumber is 4111111111111112, return processorCode is 231
For /v2/cardVerification, if use cybs card to make payment and the payment mode is AUTH, the void is successful after the transaction is completed
For /v2/cardVerification, if use cybs card to make payment and the payment mode is PURCHASE, the refund is successful after the transaction is completed
For /v2/cardVerification, if use gmo card to make payment and the payment mode is CARDVERIFICATION, when transaction amout is 0
For /v2/cardVerification, if use mpgs card to make payment and the payment mode is AUTH, the void is successful after the transaction is completed
For /v2/cardVerification, if use unionpay expresspay to make payment and the payment mode is AUTH, the void is successful after the transaction is completed
